title: How to Chop Sticky Candies for Cooking

steps.headline: Place candies such as gumdrops, gummy bears and similar gum based candies into the freezer.
steps.description: Leave for a short while and then remove for cutting. The freezing action should help remove much of the stickiness.

steps.headline: Use scissors rather than a knife for cutting the candy.
steps.description: And in between each cut, dip the scissors in cold water. For example, see How to cut marshmallows for a distinct method.

steps.headline: Keep a bowl of cold water next to your workspace.
steps.description: Dip your fingers into it regularly to keep them moist; this will help to prevent the candies from sticking to your fingers as you cut the candies.

text: Place candies such as gumdrops, gummy bears and similar gum based candies into the freezer. Leave for a short while and then remove for cutting. The freezing action should help remove much of the stickiness. Use scissors rather than a knife for cutting the candy. And in between each cut, dip the scissors in cold water. For example, see How to cut marshmallows for a distinct method. Keep a bowl of cold water next to your workspace. Dip your fingers into it regularly to keep them moist; this will help to prevent the candies from sticking to your fingers as you cut the candies.
